name: SENZA POLPO FERIRE
description:
An early prototype made for a gaming jam in 2020. 

You control an octopus and you can use a boxing glove, a sword or a gun on each of his 8 tentacles. 

Kill the fish and save your friend from the dragon! 

Arrows to move, Space to attack and C/X to rotate.

 If you rotate too fast you'll lose your weapons. 

I hope I will make a full game out of this someday.
